statements: DELETE FROM robot_logs WHERE error_message = 'Error in task';
DELETE FROM robot_logs WHERE operation_type = 'error' AND error_timestamp < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM troubleshooting WHERE action_taken LIKE '%check%' AND robot_id = 3;
DELETE FROM errors e JOIN troubleshooting t ON e.robot_id = t.robot_id WHERE e.error_timestamp < t.troubleshooting_timestamp;
DELETE FROM errors WHERE error_message LIKE '%404%';
DELETE FROM errors WHERE error_message LIKE '%404%'
DELETE FROM RobotOperationalData WHERE temperature > 50 AND battery_level < 20;
DELETE FROM logs WHERE error_code = 500 AND timestamp >= '2022-01-01 00:00:00'
